mapper.update: update consumable_item set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, consumable_type_id = #{consumableTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sts = #{sts,jdbcType=CHAR}, sts_date = #{stsDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select count(1) from consumable_item
1 =1
and consumable_type_id = #{consumableTypeId}
and name like '%${name}%'
select id, name, consumable_type_id, sts, sts_date, create_date from consumable_item
